programmes.show_description: A Sinister Séance. Terina has experienced terrifying paranormal activity in her childhood home. Determined to help her, Barri risks his life taking on the aggressive spirit. S5, Ep1
Forgotten Phantoms. Stefan needs help proving his Elizabethan farmhouse is filled with spirits of the past. Investigators uncover a heartbreaking story of illegitimacy. S5, Ep2
Teleshopping.
Drew browses a salvage fair by Ripley Castle. In Newcastle, he visits a dealer of mid-20th century designer furniture. And, he and Tee check out an art collection in Hastings. S14, Ep7
Drew and Tee take a road trip in Hungary. In Budapest, they visit one of the country's biggest antique markets. Later, they unearth treasures in a former communist factory. S14, Ep8

David Harper and Louise Gostelow continue their journey in Lytham St Annes. Louise buys a wind-up toy, while David falls in love with a painting of a dog. S20, Ep18

programmes.show_name: Who Do You Think You Are?
programmes.show_description: Matt Lucas. Matt Lucas learns what his late grandmother went through as a Jew in Nazi Germany in the 1930s. He also uncovers a connection to Anne Frank. S18, Ep8
